XPontus XML Editor features - External schema validation

section.title: Overview
section.p: You can see a schema(ie. a schema in general) as a set of rules which define the structure of an XML document. You can find more information about XML Schema at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/

section.title: What kind of external schema can you use?
section.p: You can validate XML documents against several kinds of XML schemata. XPontus supports

ul.li: a subset of XML Schema Part 1

section.title: Validating against external schema
section.p: You can convert HTML files to XHTML transitionnal using the tidy option in the menu Tools->Validate against external schema
